title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert Adam Whitely / Felicia JollyGoodFellow (Guy Pearce) costume
credit_line: Courtesy the National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
brief_description: While most of the Oscar-winning costumes in The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert (1994) were made with small budgets and creative solutions, the pom-poms on this iconic wattle dress were made by inmates at the Long Bay Correctional Complex.

constellations_other.name: Joy of drag
constellations_other.description: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert is a groundbreaking Australian film with a small budget and big impact that's taken queer Australian stories to the world.

description: While most of the Oscar-winning costumes in The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert (1994) were made with small budgets and creative solutions, the pom-poms on this iconic wattle dress were made by inmates at the Long Bay Correctional Complex.
